Name: Ender's Grunt Mode
Description: You're now a grunt, now including a class system

ConVars.Name: GRTDM_SQUADS
ConVars.HelpString: The number of Grunt/Spectre/Stalker squads that can be deployed at once, per-team (default 5)

ConVars.Name: GRTDM_REAPERS
ConVars.HelpString: The number of Reapers that can be deployed at once, per-team (default 2)

ConVars.Name: GRTDM_PROWLERS
ConVars.HelpString: The number of Prowlers that can be deployed at once, per-team (default 3)

ConVars.Name: GRTDM_PILOTS
ConVars.HelpString: The number of Titans with Pilots that can be deployed at once, per-team (default 2)

ConVars.Name: GRTDM_TITANS
ConVars.HelpString: The number of Titans without Pilots that can be deployed at once, per-team (default 0)

ConVars.Name: GRTDM_MRVNS
ConVars.HelpString: The number of Marvins that can be deployed at once, per-team (default 1)

ConVars.Name: GRTDM_GUNSHIPS
ConVars.HelpString: The number of Gunships that can be deployed at once, per-team (default 1)

ConVars.Name: GRLEVEL_SPECTRES
ConVars.HelpString: The score the opposing team must reach for spectre squads and marvins to start spawning (default 80)

ConVars.Name: GRLEVEL_STALKERS
ConVars.HelpString: The score the opposing team must reach for stalker squads and prowlers to start spawning, and marvins to stop spawning (default 150)

ConVars.Name: GRLEVEL_REAPERS
ConVars.HelpString: The score the opposing team must reach for Reapers to start spawning (default 250)

ConVars.Name: GRLEVEL_GUNSHIPS
ConVars.HelpString: The score the opposing team must reach for Gunships to start spawning (default 300)

ConVars.Name: GRLEVEL_TITANS
ConVars.HelpString: The score the opposing team must reach for Titans and Pilots to start spawning, and Prowlers to stop spawning (default 500)

ConVars.Name: CLASS_SNIPER_UNLOCK
ConVars.HelpString: The score you need to get as a Marksman to unlock the Sniper Class (default 30)

ConVars.Name: CLASS_SPECTRE_UNLOCK
ConVars.HelpString: The score you need to get as a grunt to unlock the Spectre class (default 50)

ConVars.Name: CLASS_SNIPESPECTRE_UNLOCK
ConVars.HelpString: The score you need to get as a Spectre to unlock the Sniper Spectre class (default 30)

ConVars.Name: CLASS_SPECTRELEADER_UNLOCK
ConVars.HelpString: The score you need to get as a Spectre Class to unlock the Spectre Leader class (default 60)

ConVars.Name: CLASS_BLASTSPECTRE_UNLOCK
ConVars.HelpString: The score you need to get as a Spectre Leader Class to unlock the Blast Spectre class (default 20)

ConVars.Name: CLASS_PILOT_UNLOCK
ConVars.HelpString: The score you need to get as a grunt to unlock the Pilot class (default 100)

ConVars.Name: CLASS_SENTRY_UNLOCK
ConVars.HelpString: The drones you need to spawn to unlock the Sentry class (default 5)

ConVars.Name: CLASS_OPPILOT_UNLOCK_STREAK
ConVars.HelpString: The killsteak you need to unlock the OP Pilot class (default 10)

ConVars.Name: CLASS_OPPILOT_UNLOCK_TYPE
ConVars.HelpString: The classes you can use to unlock OP Pilot [Accepted values are 'any', 'free', 'grunt', or 'rifleman', otherwise it will set to default] (default 'grunt')

ConVars.Name: COST_MARKSMAN
ConVars.HelpString: Cost to spawn as Marksman (default 5)

ConVars.Name: COST_SNIPER
ConVars.HelpString: Cost to spawn as Sniper (default 10)

ConVars.Name: COST_HEAVY
ConVars.HelpString: Cost to spawn as Heavy (default 10)

ConVars.Name: COST_SHIELD_CAPTAIN
ConVars.HelpString: Cost to spawn as Shield Captain (default 20)

ConVars.Name: COST_SPECIALIST
ConVars.HelpString: Cost to spawn as Specialist (default 30)

ConVars.Name: COST_SPECTRE
ConVars.HelpString: Cost to spawn as Spectre (default 20)

ConVars.Name: COST_BLAST_SPECTRE
ConVars.HelpString: Cost to spawn as Blast Spectre (default 25)

ConVars.Name: COST_SNIPESPECTRE
ConVars.HelpString: Cost to spawn as Sniper Spectre (default 25)

ConVars.Name: COST_SENTRY
ConVars.HelpString: Cost to spawn as Sentry Technician (default 40)

ConVars.Name: COST_SPECTRE_LEADER
ConVars.HelpString: Cost to spawn as Spectre Leader (default 35)

ConVars.Name: COST_PILOT
ConVars.HelpString: Cost to spawn as Pilot (default 80)

ConVars.Name: COST_OPPILOT
ConVars.HelpString: Cost to spawn as OP Pilot (default 140)

ConVars.Name: GR_OPTICS_LEVEL
ConVars.HelpString: The score you need to get as a class to unlock optics for that class (default 15)

ConVars.Name: GR_ATTACHMENT_LEVEL
ConVars.HelpString: The score you need to get as a class to unlock an attachment for that class (default 30)

ConVars.Name: GR_ATTACHMENT_LEVEL_MULTIPLE
ConVars.HelpString: The score you need to get as a class to unlock your first attachment for that class (default 20)

ConVars.Name: GR_ATTACHMENT_LEVEL_MULTIPLE_2
ConVars.HelpString: The score you need to get as a class to unlock your second attachment for that class (default 40)
